original_text: Then he went up and lay on the child, putting his mouth on his mouth, his eyes on his eyes, and his hands on his hands. And as he stretched himself upon him, the flesh of the child became warm.
korean_text: 아이 위에 올라 엎드려 자기 입을 그의 입에, 자기 눈을 그의 눈에, 자기 손을 그의 손에 대고 그의 몸에 엎드리니 아이의 살이 차차 따뜻하더라

sentences.original_text: putting his mouth on his mouth
and his hands on his hands
And as he stretched himself upon him
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 아이 위로 몸을 펼칠 때

sentences.original_text: the flesh of the child became warm
